data.eml:eml: The freshwater shrimp family Euryrhynchidae Holthuis, 1950 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Caridea) revisited, with a taxonomic revision of the genus Euryrhynchus Miers, 1878

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Pachelle, Paulo P. G., Tavares, Marcos (2018): The freshwater shrimp family Euryrhynchidae Holthuis, 1950 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Caridea) revisited, with a taxonomic revision of the genus Euryrhynchus Miers, 1878. Zootaxa 4380 (1), DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4380.1.1
